awards.text: Won 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: A pregnant white Southern girl and a black New York lawyer, both on the run in rural Texas, meet up in a boarded-up, abandoned house and realize they both need each other in order to survive.

title: My Sweet Charlie
